main event: An observer in Castalia, Ohio, reported seeing a silvery cigar-shaped object at high speed moving from east to west on July 25, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 10-25 seconds, with the object estimated to be about 20 feet in length,The object slowed down, hovered, and then accelerated before disappearing,The observer noted no sound was made by the object,It was moving at a course of 355 degrees,The investigation concluded the object was unidentified with no physical evidence found.
